Welcome to Total Pack Indonesia

Focuses on speedy, quality, innovative and competitive flexible packaging products and services to the local and world markets

Get Started

PT. Total Pack Indonesia (TPI) is a full service packaging company based in Cikarang, West Java, Indonesia. Incorporated in September 2011.

With our established plant and vast experience in the industry, PT. TPI focuses on speedy, quality, innovative and competitive flexible packaging products and services to the local and world markets. Our capabilities allow us to meet demand that range across various market needs.
